  Designing websites (Quarto reports) and visualizations to be accessible becomes much more challenging, and rewarding, when you test your work using a screen-reader.
---

![](screen-reader.png)




This will be a walk-through of basic operation of a screen-reader, with some tips on how you can design more-accessible web pages. We will also look at Olli, a tool for extracting a text from visualization-specs, for use in screen readers.
